Author facebook Author twitter Author email Jul 7, 2023 Jul 7, 2023UpdatedApr 16, 2025 0 Facebook Twitter WhatsApp SMS Email Facebook Twitter WhatsApp SMS Email Print Copy article link Save Has a person or a business significantly had a positive impact on you or someone you know? WTHI-TV has teamed up with Andrews Heating & Air Conditioning to honor those people with a Make a Difference Award. We need your help recognizing them for their hard work. All you have to do is submit a nomination below. We will spotlight that person or business each month for making a positive impact.
